title: List of all Androidbeacon   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidbeacon   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-beacon-library
repoList.description: Allows Android apps to interact with BLE beacons

repoList.name: android-beacon-library-reference
repoList.description: A reference application for the Android Beacon Library

repoList.name: Android-iBeacon-Demo
repoList.description: Demo app for the Android library providing APIs to interact with iBeacons which is developed by:  http://developer.radiusnetworks.com/ibeacon/android/index.html

repoList.name: beacons-android
repoList.description: Android BLE advertising library

repoList.name: ReactiveBeacons
repoList.description: Android library scanning BLE beacons nearby with RxJava

repoList.name: beacon-keeper
repoList.description: Simple android library for working with iBeacons in background

repoList.name: liferay-android-beacons
repoList.description: A Titanium Appcelerator module to interact with iBeacons via the Radius Networks' iBeacon native android library

repoList.name: Deacon
repoList.description: (an)Droid + Beacon - A Push Notification Library for Android
repoList.license: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0

repoList.name: react-native-beacons-android
repoList.description: A React-Native library for detecting beacons on Android

repoList.name: eddystone-demo
repoList.description: A simple demonstration of using Eddystone Beacons with the Android Beacon Library
